mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST ( ID, MEMBER_ID, POST_CONTENT ,POST_IMAGE1, POST_IMAGE2, POST_IMAGE3, POST_IMAGE4, POST_IMAGE5, POST_COLOR) VALUES (SEQ_POST.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{postContent}, #{postImage1}, #{postImage2}, #{postImage3}, #{postImage4}, #{postImage5}, #{postColor})
mapper.select: SELECT TP.ID, TP.MEMBER_ID, TP.POST_CONTENT, TP.POST_COLOR, TM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TM.MEMBER_EMAIL, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 1 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_PATH1, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 1 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_NAME1, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 2 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_PATH2, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 2 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_NAME2, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 3 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_PATH3, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 3 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_NAME3, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 4 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_PATH4, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 4 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_NAME4, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 5 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_PATH5, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 5 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_NAME5 FROM TBL_POST TP LEFT JOIN ( SELECT POST_ID, POST_FILE_PATH, POST_FILE_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY POST_ID ORDER BY ID) AS ROW_NUM FROM TBL_POST_FILE ) TF ON TP.ID = TF.POST_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON TP.MEMBER_ID = TM.ID GROUP BY TP.ID, TP.MEMBER_ID, TP.POST_CONTENT, TP.POST_COLOR, TM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TM.MEMBER_EMAIL ORDER BY TP.ID

SELECT TP.ID, TP.MEMBER_ID, TP.POST_CONTENT, TP.POST_COLOR, TM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TM.MEMBER_EMAIL, COUNT(TCL.ID) AS POST_LIKE_COUNT, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 1 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_PATH1, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 1 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_NAME1, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 2 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_PATH2, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 2 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_NAME2, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 3 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_PATH3, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 3 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_NAME3, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 4 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_PATH4, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 4 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_NAME4, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 5 THEN TF.POST_FILE_PATH END) AS IMAGE_PATH5, MAX(CASE WHEN TF.ROW_NUM = 5 THEN TF.POST_FILE_NAME END) AS IMAGE_NAME5 FROM TBL_POST TP LEFT JOIN ( SELECT POST_ID, POST_FILE_PATH, POST_FILE_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY POST_ID ORDER BY ID) AS ROW_NUM FROM TBL_POST_FILE ) TF ON TP.ID = TF.POST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON TP.MEMBER_ID = TM.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_COMM_LIKES TCL ON TP.ID = TCL.POST_ID GROUP BY TP.ID, TP.MEMBER_ID, TP.POST_CONTENT, TP.POST_COLOR, TM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TM.MEMBER_EMAIL ORDER BY POST_LIKE_COUNT DESC

SELECT TP.ID, TP.POST_CONTENT, TP.POST_IMAGE1, TP.POST_IMAGE2, TP.POST_IMAGE3, TP.POST_IMAGE4, TP.POST_IMAGE5, TP.POST_COLOR, TP.MEMBER_ID, TM.MEMBER_NAME, TM.MEMBER_EMAIL FROM TBL_POST TP JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON TP.MEMBER_ID = TM.ID AND TP.ID = #{id}
